General:
**Below is a full list of available commands**
To better understand commands, visit the [Offical Commands Page](https://bigtuna.xyz/commands)

**Gameplay** :fish:
fish, aquarium, collect, shop, setlocation, quest, bounty, baitshop, card, givecard

**Profile Commands** :trophy:
stats, serverstats, equipment, baits, leaderboards, fishleaderboards

**Info Commands** :question:
help, info, iteminfo, fishinfo, locationinfo

**Extra Commands** :eyes:
vote, server, toggle, optin, optout
Start: A more detailed version of this guide can be found on our [Getting Started](https://bigtuna.xyz/start) webpage
**Welcome!**
With Big Tuna, there are **4** main things that drive progress:
**1. Fishing**
- Fish with the `${PREFIX}fish` command, and click the :hook: (or wait) to reel in your catch
- Vote with `${PREFIX}vote` to reset your fishing cooldown
**2. Collecting from your aquariums**
- View your aquarium with `${PREFIX}aquarium`
- Collect coins by clicking the :coin: or by typing `${PREFIX}collect`
- High-tier and larger fish earn more money
**3. Upgrading your equipment**
- Open the shop with `${PREFIX}shop`
- Upgrade your aquarium for more capacity and earn rate
- Upgrade your fishing equipment to be able to catch larger fish
- Your max weight is the *lowest* weight out of your **hook**, **line**, and **rod**
**4. Baits/quests (unlocks at lvl. 10)**
- Access your quest and earn :lollipop: with `${PREFIX}quest`
- Buy baits with `${PREFIX}baitshop`
**The Other Commands**
The remaining commands are more about viewing information.
fishinfo: Views info about a fish (try `${PREFIX}fi spotted bass`)
locationinfo: Views info about a location (try `${PREFIX}li 1`)
iteminfo: Views info about an item (try `${PREFIX}ii wooden rod` or `${PREFIX}ii hooks`)
The profile commands are all super simple, so go try them out too!
fish: - Just type `${PREFIX}fish` to not use bait.
- Fishes at the current location of the player.
- The fish you catch will *always* be close to your hook.
- Click the :hook: or wait a few seconds to reel in your catch.
aquarium: <location number> defaults to your location when no number is provided
- Views your aquarium, consisting of your largest catch of each species from the given location.
- Revenue is based off of the fish caught, and is collected by clicking the :coin: icon.
- Upgrades can be bought in the shop, and increase both revenue *and* coin capacity.
- Ping a user with this command to see their aquarium
collect: <location number> defaults to `all` when no number is provided
- A convenient way to collect money from your aquariums
shop: - :lock: = not unlocked yet. :credit_card: = not enough money
- React with the corresponding icon to purchase an item
baitshop: - React with the corresponding icon to purchase an item
setlocation: - Sets your fishing location to somewhere else (given that you have unlocked that location)
quest: - Claim quest rewards from here too
card: - Shows your card collection or a specific card
- You may put fish from cards in your aquarium
givecard: - Gives one of your cards to another player
stats: - Ping a user with this command to see their stats
serverstats: - Global rankings are based on weight caught
equipment: - Shows you your pieces of equipment and their stats
- Useful for deciding what to upgrade
- Ping a user with this command to see their equipment
leaderboards: - Shows the top 20 players in the server by weight caught
fishleaderboards: - Shows the top 10 global and server rankings for a fish
info: <command> defaults to general when no value (or an invalid value) is provided
iteminfo: <item name> can also be one of `rods`, `hooks`, `lines`, or `aquariums`
- Gives you all information about a given item
fishinfo: - Gives you all information about a given fish
- Can also be used to view fish species
- Type only `.fishinfo` for a list of fish species
locationinfo: <location number> defaults to all when no value (or an invalid value) is provided
- Gives you all information about a given location
- Includes unlock level, all fish, fish rarity
vote: - Returns a link to the voting page
- Vote to reset your fishing cooldown
server: - Returns a link to the official server
toggle: - As of now, the only setting that can be toggled is `startinfo`
- Can only be used by members with `Manage Server` privileges
optin: - Allows other players to view your stuff
optout: - Makes it so other players cannot view your stuff
- This covers stats, aquariums, and equipment
